content:
I have a problem to parsin on weblogic 12.1.2.0, this error,
for more detail check the following link http://stackoverflow.com/questions/39800012/parse-error-in-fhir-with-decimaltype-on-weblogic-12-1-2
Hi @Edison Carvajal , not sure if you saw my response in there. I do know that people are successfully using HAPI in Weblogic FWIW.
Hi @James Agnew, If you recommended me before Hapi, the issue is that I can not use it for implementeacion we currently, at the moment I'm using the library fhir-dstu2-1.0.1.7108.jar... thanks..
